Prefect Vokiyan:
The stone shards of Manasen, the claws of the Tylant, and the teeth of the basilisk! Good! This should be enough. Now I shall grant you the Necklace of Authority! Agent of the Lord, go and practice orders of Lord Kakai! Hurry to go and meet Chianta, the Chief of Dion Castle Town! He will tell you what to do!
